content.text:
"Someone Like You" by Adele
CAPO: II

[Intro]
[ch]G[/ch] [ch]Bm[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]C[/ch]

[Verse 1]
[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]Bm[/ch]
I heard that you're settled down
         [ch]Em[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]
That you found a girl and you're married now
[ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]Bm[/ch]
I heard that your dreams came true
          [ch]Em[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
Guess she gave you things I didn't give to you
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]Bm[/ch]
Old friend, why are you so shy?
           [ch]Em[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]
Ain't like you to hold back or hide from the light

[Pre-Chorus]
  [ch]D[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]
I hate to turn up out of the blue uninvited
      [ch]C[/ch]                 
But I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it
    [ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]Em[/ch]
I'd hoped you'd see my face and that you'd be reminded
         [ch]C[/ch]            
That for me it isn't over

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
Never mind, I'll find someone like you
       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I wish nothing but the best for you two
         [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
Don't forget me, I beg, I'll remember you said
             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Sometimes it lasts in love but sometimes it hurts instead
             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Sometimes it lasts in love but sometimes it hurts instead

[Verse 2]
    [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]Bm[/ch]
You know how the time flies
     [ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]
Only yesterday was the time of our lives
        [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]Bm[/ch]
We were born and raised in a summer haze
      [ch]Em[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
Bound by the surprise of our glory days

[Pre-Chorus]
  [ch]D[/ch]                          [ch]Em[/ch]
I hate to turn up out of the blue uninvited
      [ch]C[/ch]                 
But I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it
    [ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Em[/ch]
I'd hoped you'd see my face and that you'd be reminded
         [ch]C[/ch]            
That for me it isn't over

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
Never mind, I'll find someone like you
       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I wish nothing but the best for you two
         [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
Don't forget me, I beg, I'll remember you said
             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]
Sometimes it lasts in love but sometimes it hurts instead, yeah

[Bridge]
[ch]D[/ch]
Nothing compares, no worries or cares
  [ch]Em[/ch]
Regrets and mistakes, they are memories made
[ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]
Who would have known how bittersweet this would taste?

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
Never mind, I'll find someone like you
       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]
I wish nothing but the best for you...
         [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
Don't forget me, I beg, I'll remember you said
             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Sometimes it lasts in love but sometimes it hurts instead

[Chorus]
[ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]

       [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]

             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Sometimes it lasts in love but sometimes it hurts instead
             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Sometimes it lasts in love but sometimes it hurts instead

[Outro]

Play the chords D and C#m in second inversion KEEP THAT IN MIND it's also easier to play.

NOTE: You need to use the inversion, it sounds way better.

Artist: Adele
Song: Someone Like You
Played on Jools Holland 'Later' November 2010
prior to its release on the '21' album in 2011.
That Jools performance was accompanied by piano, but an arpeggiated acoustic
guitar works beautifully with the song too.

This song is best picked rather than strummed, just playing simple patterns on the basic 
chords. I have added suggestions for the picking pattern at the bottom of the tab.
***
(Original guitar chord names listed in this version were completely off. I used find and paste technique from 
MSWord to make fixes to reflect finger positions. I am not sure of how to affect changes to the pop up 
chording that is for uke and I did not address the uke chord variations at document end but I hope this helps 
soothe some tensions for those that want to play this version of the song with properly named guitar chords 
for the listed finger positions. 
Stephen Honkanen. shonkanen@yahoo.com 1/4/15)
***

-----------------------------------------

I hope the following will assist!

OK. The numbers on the strings should relate to which finger to use -

't' is thumb, 1,2,3 are 1st, 2nd, 3rd fingers respectively!

So the D chord (xx0232) picked like this

E-------------------|
B-----2-------2-----|
G---1---1---1---1---|
D-t-------t---------|t...... etc
A-------------------|
E-------------------|

The A chord (x02220) like this! nb finger '3' can be left out or played simultaneously with '2'!

E---------------------------|
B-------3-----------3-------|
G-----2---2-------2---2-----|
D---1-------1---1-------1---|
A-t-----------t-------------|t....etc
E---------------------------|

...and so on for the other chords.

Luckily for us all, although Adele is magnificent, she plays guitar in a quite simple style!


-----------------------------------------

I hope I've done it justice!

Kevin O'Brien
Watford
England
October 2010

watfordkev@gmail.com

(Appreciation to Kevin for his work but I had to submit corrected chord names - SH, sorry Kevin.)

END

I've seen some strange things in other tabs, the augmented Gb (F#) being an
 Eb for instance. In this version you can really see the up- and downgoing
 bass notes. E.g. in the verse you go from Bb to A, to Ab, and in the bridge

 nice voicings it can sound well on the guitar, too.
